sn12.23:1.2: “Janato aham, bhikkhave, passato asavanam khayam vadami, no ajanato no apassato.
sn12.23:1.3: Kinca, bhikkhave, janato kim passato asavanam khayo hoti?
sn12.23:1.4: Iti rupam iti rupassa samudayo iti rupassa atthangamo,
sn12.23:1.8: iti vinnanam iti vinnanassa samudayo iti vinnanassa atthangamoti.
sn12.23:1.9: Evam kho, bhikkhave, janato evam passato asavanam khayo hoti.
sn12.23:2.1: Yampissa tam, bhikkhave, khayasmim khaye nanam, tampi saupanisam vadami, no anupanisam.
sn12.23:2.2: Ka ca, bhikkhave, khaye nanassa upanisa?
sn12.23:2.4: Vimuttimpaham, bhikkhave, saupanisam vadami, no anupanisam.
sn12.23:2.7: Viragampaham, bhikkhave, saupanisam vadami, no anupanisam.
sn12.23:2.10: Nibbidampaham, bhikkhave, saupanisam vadami, no anupanisam.
sn12.23:2.13: Yathabhutananadassanampaham, bhikkhave, saupanisam vadami, no anupanisam.
sn12.23:2.16: Samadhimpaham, bhikkhave, saupanisam vadami, no anupanisam.
sn12.23:3.3: Sukhampaham, bhikkhave, saupanisam vadami, no anupanisam.
sn12.23:3.6: Passaddhimpaham, bhikkhave, saupanisam vadami, no anupanisam.
sn12.23:3.9: Pitimpaham, bhikkhave, saupanisam vadami, no anupanisam.
sn12.23:3.12: Pamojjampaham, bhikkhave, saupanisam vadami, no anupanisam.
sn12.23:3.15: Saddhampaham, bhikkhave, saupanisam vadami, no anupanisam.
sn12.23:4.3: Dukkhampaham, bhikkhave, saupanisam vadami, no anupanisam.
sn12.23:4.6: Jatimpaham, bhikkhave, saupanisam vadami, no anupanisam.
sn12.23:4.9: Bhavampaham, bhikkhave, saupanisam vadami, no anupanisam.
sn12.23:4.12: Upadanampaham, bhikkhave, saupanisam vadami, no anupanisam.
sn12.23:4.15: Tanhampaham, bhikkhave, saupanisam vadami, no anupanisam.
sn12.23:5.8: Sankharepaham, bhikkhave, saupanise vadami, no anupanise.
sn12.23:7.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, uparipabbate thullaphusitake deve vassante tam udakam yathaninnam pavattamanam pabbatakandarapadarasakha paripureti. Pabbatakandarapadarasakhaparipura kusobbhe paripurenti. Kusobbha paripura mahasobbhe paripurenti. Mahasobbha paripura kunnadiyo paripurenti. Kunnadiyo paripura mahanadiyo paripurenti. Mahanadiyo paripura mahasamuddam paripurenti.
sn12.23:8.1: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, avijjupanisa sankhara, sankharupanisam vinnanam, vinnanupanisam namarupam, namarupupanisam salayatanam, salayatanupaniso phasso, phassupanisa vedana, vedanupanisa tanha, tanhupanisam upadanam, upadanupaniso bhavo, bhavupanisa jati, jatupanisam dukkham, dukkhupanisa saddha, saddhupanisam pamojjam, pamojjupanisa piti, pitupanisa passaddhi, passaddhupanisam sukham, sukhupaniso samadhi, samadhupanisam yathabhutananadassanam, yathabhutananadassanupanisa nibbida, nibbidupaniso virago, viragupanisa vimutti, vimuttupanisam khaye nanan”ti.
